protocol.label: Protocol
protocol.help: (Optional) The MQTT Protocol to use to connect to the MQTT Broker/Server. Default: mqtt

protocol_version.label: Protocol Version
protocol_version.help: (Optional) The MQTT Protocol version to use to connect to the MQTT Broker/Server. Default: 3.1.1

host.label: Host
host.help: The host/IP address of the MQTT Broker/Server to connect to.

port.label: Port
port.help: The port of the MQTT Broker/Server to connect to.

topic.label: Topic
topic.help: The topic to subscribe to for data.

client_id.label: Client ID
client_id.help: (Optional) The client id to use to connect to the broker. Auto-generated if not supplied.

user.label: Username
user.help: (Optional) The username to use to authenticate with the MQTT Broker/Server.

password.label: Password
password.help: (Optional) The password to use to authenticate with the MQTT Broker/Server.

reschedule_pings.label: Reschedule Pings
reschedule_pings.help: Reschedule ping messages after sending packets. Default: true

queue_qos_zero.label: Queue QoS Zero
queue_qos_zero.help: Queue outgoing QoS 0 packets. Default: true

device_key.label: Device ID Property/Key
device_key.help: The key or property where the device id will be pulled from. Defaults to 'device'
